description: The best and simplest veggie dumplings.
name: Veggie Dumplings Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 packets double merino pastry gow gee

recipeInstructions.text: Grate the cabbage, carrot and onion and combine in a bowl.
Add salt, sugar, minced garlic, minced ginger, soy sauce and flour to the cabbage, carrot and onion mixture and stir till combined.
Add roughly 1 tsp of mixture to each gow gee pastry and use a dumpling folder or fold pastry and use water to seal the edge.
Add sesame seed oil to a large frying pan (must have a lid) on medium heat, add dumplings and dry till one side is golden brown.
Add 1/4 cup of water to the pan and cover with a lid. Dumplings are cooked when the pastry is partially transparent like the picture above.
Repeat steps 3-5 till all the mixture or pastry is gone. Serve with more soy sauce for dipping.
